children.text: We are going to combine two Python programs into a single C program.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
The first program:
   - Reads two integers: n and d.
   - Then reads n lines, each containing d integers (a point in d-dimensional space).
   - For every pair of distinct points (i, j) with i < j , it computes the Euclidean distance.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
- Counts the number of pairs for which the distance is an integer (i.e., the fractional part is 0).
   - Prints the count.
